name: The enameled ring of the elder serpent
data: It increases the users wisdom unnoticably.
It increases the users intelligence strongly.
It has adequate armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'channel power'.
Ring of the Elder Serpent modifies the skill navigator's way.
